title: Alien Zoo Adventure #5
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Quarantine Bay
rooms.description: A sterile containment facility with reinforced glass chambers housing bizarre alien creatures. Bioluminescent organisms pulse with eerie light in their tanks. Warning klaxons flash silently overhead. The air is filtered and cold. Control panels blink with alien script and human translations. Strange chittering and humming sounds echo from the specimens.

items.name: specimen control console
items.description: A computer terminal displaying containment status and facility information
items.text: XENOBIOLOGY RESEARCH STATION - Established 2187. Director: Dr. Helena Voss. Chief Xenobiologist: Dr. Marcus Kane. All specimens are housed in the quarantine bay. Emergency protocols stored in the research laboratory.

items.name: containment tank alpha
items.description: A large tank containing a floating jellyfish-like creature with multiple eyes
items.text: SPECIMEN ALPHA: Nebula Drifter - Origin: Andromeda Sector. Status: CONTAINED. Bioluminescent, telepathic abilities suspected. Extremely dangerous if released.

items.name: containment tank beta
items.description: A reinforced chamber holding a crystalline insectoid creature
items.text: SPECIMEN BETA: Crystal Mantis - Origin: Kepler-442b. Status: CONTAINED. Silicon-based lifeform. Highly aggressive. Handle with extreme caution.

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker with three compartments for emergency equipment

items.name: facility operations manual
items.description: A digital tablet with station procedures
items.text: STATION OPERATIONS: This facility was established in 2187 to study xenobiological specimens. All research is conducted in the research laboratory. Director Voss oversees all operations. The combination to secure storage is the year of establishment.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with 'LABORATORY ACCESS' printed on it

items.name: observation window
items.description: A thick window overlooking the alien specimens

items.name: xenobiologist's notes
items.description: A datapad with handwritten observations
items.text: Dr. Kane's Log: The specimens in the quarantine bay are becoming increasingly agitated. I've secured the specimen data files in the lab safe. If we need to evacuate, the escape pods are our only option. Director Voss has the final authority on all evacuation procedures.

items.name: small specimen cage
items.description: A portable containment unit sitting on a workbench

items.name: strange alien artifact
items.description: A small crystalline object that hums with energy

items.name: laboratory access door
items.description: A heavy airlock door with a card reader, leading to the research laboratory

rooms.name: Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A high-tech laboratory filled with analysis equipment, holographic displays, and specimen samples in stasis fields. Microscopes and gene sequencers line the workbenches. Data screens show alien DNA structures and behavioral patterns. A large safe sits in the corner. The escape pod bay access is visible through a reinforced window.

items.name: main research workbench
items.description: A cluttered workstation with various scientific instruments and datapads

items.name: specimen analysis report
items.description: A detailed scientific report on the alien specimens
items.text: XENOBIOLOGY REPORT by Dr. Marcus Kane: All specimens are housed in the quarantine bay for safety. The Nebula Drifter (Specimen Alpha) is our most dangerous acquisition. Research conducted here in the laboratory has revealed fascinating insights into alien biology.

items.name: holographic display terminal
items.description: A floating holographic interface showing station schematics
items.text: STATION LAYOUT: Quarantine Bay - Specimen containment. Research Laboratory - Analysis and study. Escape Pod Bay - Emergency evacuation. Director: Dr. Helena Voss. Chief Xenobiologist: Dr. Marcus Kane.

items.name: alien gene sequencer
items.description: A sophisticated machine analyzing alien DNA samples
items.text: ANALYSIS IN PROGRESS: Specimen Alpha DNA structure is unlike anything in our database. The creature's telepathic abilities make it extremely dangerous. Evacuation protocols may be necessary.

items.name: laboratory safe
items.description: A secure safe containing sensitive research data and equipment

items.name: evacuation protocol document
items.description: Official emergency evacuation procedures
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of containment breach or critical emergency, proceed immediately to the escape pod bay. Authorization required from Director Voss. Security verification questions must be answered: 1) What is the most dangerous specimen? 2) Where are specimens contained? 3) Who authorizes evacuation?

items.name: emergency distress beacon
items.description: A handheld device for signaling rescue ships

items.name: director's desk
items.description: Dr. Voss's personal workstation with locked drawers

items.name: director's personal log
items.description: Dr. Voss's private journal
items.text: Director's Log: As station director, I alone have the authority to order evacuation. The Nebula Drifter in the quarantine bay is showing signs of breaking containment. If the situation deteriorates, we must use the escape pods immediately. I pray it doesn't come to that.

items.name: escape pod bay access door
items.description: A sealed emergency door with a security terminal displaying three verification questions. Red warning lights pulse around the frame.

password_questions.question: What is the most dangerous specimen?
password_questions.hint: Check the specimen reports and Dr. Voss's personal log

password_questions.question: Where are specimens contained?
password_questions.hint: The facility manual and reports mention where specimens are housed

password_questions.question: Who authorizes evacuation?
password_questions.hint: Check the evacuation protocol and facility information

rooms.name: Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You've reached the escape pod bay! A sleek emergency evacuation pod sits in its launch cradle, systems humming with readiness. Through the transparent launch tube, you can see the stars and the safety of open space. The pod's interior glows with soft blue light, and the control panel displays 'READY FOR LAUNCH' in bright green letters.

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A streamlined single-occupant spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: The pod's control interface showing all systems operational and ready

items.name: launch tube viewport
items.description: A window showing the launch trajectory into open space and freedom

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You climb into the escape pod and seal the hatch. The launch sequence initiates automatically, and within seconds you're rocketing away from the alien zoo station. Through the viewport, you watch the facility shrink into the distance as you head toward the safety of the nearest human outpost. You've escaped the Alien Zoo! You win!
